DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergo Open Cardiac Surgery randomize two group . Group I ventilate 40 % Fio2 induction , surgery Postoperative care unit . Group II ventilate 100 % Fio2 induction 60-70 % ( determine accord arterial blood gas sample result ) surgery Postoperative care unit . Hemodynamic parameter ( systolic arterial pressure , diastolic arterial pressure , heart rate ) , Arterial blood gas sample ( PaO2 , PaCO2 , pH , Oxygen saturation , Lactate ) , pre post cardiopulmonary bypass Superoxide dismutase malonyl aldehyde level .
DOC.criteria: ASA IIIII Patients EF high 50 % . patient undergo elective open heart surgery pump ( CABG , Valve Replacement ) patient Diabetes Mellitus patient COPD Patients Cerebral Vascular Disease Patients hypoxia Arterial blood gas sample ( PaO2 low 80 mmHg ) hypercarbia ( PaCO2 high 45 mmHg )
